line: Skip
"This is the developer speaking"
"If this message manage to reach you"
"Then the early demo of VBM POS has been finished"
"Well, it's called Cafe Lajoie now, so whatever"
"What you're about to see is what people call progress"
"Started from an idea, and now it has become something"
"To be honest, i don't have much to say"
"Without further ado, enjoy"
"It's mid-afternoon. The sun shines so brightly."
"You watch people walk as you sit on a chair in the middle of a shopping district."
"While wathcing peoples minding their own bussiness, you just remembered that you haven't had lunch yet."
"And so, you are hungry."
"You stand up and start wondering around to find a place to eat."
"Nothing really catch your eye, until you reach the end of the shopping district."
"You saw a small board standing in front of a door made of glass"
"Cafe Lajoie."
"You don't recall seeing this place before."
"Maybe it has only been opened just recently?"
"Nevertheless, you are intrigued."
"You decided to have lunch in this place."
Fade_BG
Play_Music
"Welcome"
"As you walk through the door, you are greeted by the waitress who waited in front of the door"
"Long grey hair and blue eyes. You don't meet such features much these days."
"With a radiant smile the waitress welcome you inside the cafe."
"Table for one, right? Would you like the smoking or non-smoking section?"
"The waitress asked you in which section you wish to be dining."
Selection
"Smoking Area"
"Non-Smoking Area"
"Very well, please follow me"
"You walk to your table with the waitress guiding you there"
"You sat on the chair the waitress guided you to"
"Here is our menu."
"The waitress handed you the menu."
"Excuse me, but I will be leaving you now."
"Just call me when you have decided what to order."
"The waitress left you. You open the menu to see what they are serving."
"It turns out that they don't really serve much food."
"They only had 2 main dishes, which are Curry Rice and Ramen noodle."
"A pretty standard food for a lovely place like this."
"Not to mention this place name, Lajoie. In French it translates to The Joy."
"You're not sure you feel any joy coming out from this place"
"Perhaps it's because you're the only one here at this moment."
"Well, we shouldn't be too quick to judge."
"With so little option you can choose, you decide to call the waitress to take your order."
"Yes, may I take your order?"
Jump_to_Line
"Ergh... sorry, but we don't have that."
"Something else that I can get you?"
Selection
"Curry Rice"
"Ramen Noodle"
"WAAAAFFFLEEEESSS!!!!!"
"Curry Rice it is then."
Jump_to_Line
"Ramen Noodle it is then."
"The waitress writes your order in her order book."
"I will bring your order as soon as it's ready"
"Now, if you excuse me"
"And so, she left you once again."
"Aside from the lack of food variety they have here, everything else are impressive."
"The waitress is especially good with her job serving."
"You feel genuinely welcomed and treated like well distinguished guest."
"When I think about it, is this what people call maid cafe?"
"Though not obvious, her dress reminds you that of maids in those kind of cafe"
"Now then , it's time you wait for your meal to come."
"You casually open your phone, trying to distract yourself."
Fade_BG
"And so you wait."
Fade_BG
"Thank you for waiting. here is your order"
"The waitress sets your meal above the table."
"By the smell and the look of it, you will be having a good lunch."
"Enjoy."
"There's nothing left to say, time to chow down."
Fade_BG
"The food is good."
"You ended up devouring your food."
"You just can't help yourself by the deliciousness of the meal you're eating."
Fade_BG
"Without you realizing it, you have finished your food."
"You didn't want to stay too long, so you call the waitress for your check."
"How were your food? I hope you like it."
"Anyway, here's your bill. You can pay it at the cashier"
"Without thinking much, you head straight to the cashier to pay your bill"
Fade_BG
Fade_BG
"Please come again."
"As you walk toward the exit, the waitress opened the door and says farewell."
"It was not much, but it was a refreshing experience eating here."
Fade_BG
"As you take a step outside, you wonders."
"Maybe I should come here more often"
"The end"
"This is the end of the demo"
Jump_to_Line
"Very well, please follow me"
"You walk to your table with the waitress guiding you there"
"You sat on the chair the waitress guided you to"
"Here is our menu."
"The waitress handed you the menu."
"Excuse me, but I will be leaving you now."
"Just call me when you have decided what to order."
"The waitress left you. You open the menu to see what they are serving."
"It turns out that they don't really serve much food."
"They only had 2 main dishes, which are Curry Rice and Ramen noodle."
"A pretty standard food for a lovely place like this."
"Not to mention this place name, Lajoie. In French it translates to The Joy."
"You're not sure you feel any joy coming out from this place"
"Perhaps it's because you're the only one here at this moment."
"Well, we shouldn't be too quick to judge."
"With so little option you can choose, you decide to call the waitress to take your order."
"Yes, may I take your order?"
Jump_to_Line
"Ergh... sorry, but we don't have that."
"Something else that I can get you?"
Selection
"Curry Rice"
"Ramen Noodle"
"WAAAAFFFLEEEESSS!!!!!"
"Curry Rice it is then."
Jump_to_Line
"Ramen Noodle it is then."
"The waitress writes your order in her order book."
"I will bring your order as soon as it's ready"
"Now, if you excuse me"
"And so, she left you once again."
"Aside from the lack of food variety they have here, everything else are impressive."
"The waitress is especially good with her job serving."
"You feel genuinely welcomed and treated like well distinguished guest."
"When I think about it, is this what people call maid cafe?"
"Though not obvious, her dress reminds you that of maids in those kind of cafe"
"Now then , it's time you wait for your meal to come."
"You casually open your phone, trying to distract yourself."
"You sense the waitress staring at you while you're not looking"
"She is standing not far from where you are sitting"
"You don't really feel any bad intent from her, perhaps there's something she wanted to say to you"
Selection
"What is it?"
"Yes?"
"Urgh... sorry..."
"She walk toward your table to get closer to you"
"Sorry, did I bother you?"
Selection
"Not really"
"A bit"
Play_Music
"I-I see..."
Play_Music
"We don't often have customers come here, especially at this hour"
"It can be lonely, you know"
"Well, this is new"
"You're not sure if this is okay."
"As her briliant smile turn slightly sadder, you feel as she is a completly different person."
"Since you didn't know what to do, you just let things happen"
"I'm glad that you came here today. I really do."
"I know it's weird cause we never met before."
"But thank you..."
"This is the time when you are suppose to say something"
Selection
"What?"
"Get lost!"
"I LOVE YOU"
"Since you don't have the BALLS to actually said that, you ended up only nodding to her"
"In reply, she smiles back to you"
Play_Music
"And just like that, she smiles again like when you just came here"
"You're not really sure what just happen, so you just shruged it off"
"Do you want to play with me?"
"You know... until your food ready?"
"The thougth of declining her crossed your mind"
"Of course, you don't want to act like an asshole, so you accepted her offer"
Play_Music
"Great"
"Let's go~~!"
"And just like that, you decided to play with her"
Play_Music
"Although you are not even sure about what is going on"
Change_Scene_With_Pref
Fade_BG
Play_Music
"Yay, you finished the game"
"How was it? Did you enjoy it?"
Selection
"Yes, actually"
"It was fine"
"Could have been better"
"Right, right?"
"I'm glad you enjoyed it"
Jump_to_Line
"Eeh... Is that so?"
"Well, you don't dislike it, I guess it's okay."
Jump_to_Line
"Ugh.. Why though?"
"I was hoping you would enjoy it"
"It maybe a bit too much."
"Can I call you "Master"?"
"You know, like in maid cafes..."
Selection
"Sure"
"Yes, but tell me your name first"
"Yay, now I have a Master"
"Oh, I forgot. I haven't introduced myself haven't I?"
"My name is Miyuki."
"Starting today,I will be at your service, Master"
"You're not really sure how things turn out the way it is"
"But you just acquired yourself a personal maid"
"At least, in here"
"Miyuki huh?"
"It may feel a bit awkward remembering the circumstances"
"But you accepted her with an open hand"
"Ah, it appears your lunch is ready"
"Miyuki stands up and walk toward the window between the dining floor and the kitchen"
"Walking back here, she brought with her the food that you ordered"
"Here you go, Master"
"As Miyuki set up your plate, you can see how she carefully put your dish"
"You can notice how her thoughtfulness translated to your dining experience here."
"Enjoy your meal, Master"
"For a second you forgot why you're here in the first play"
"It's time to eat up"
Fade_BG
"The food is good."
"You ended up devouring your food."
"You just can't help yourself by the deliciousness of the meal you're eating."
Fade_BG
"Without you realizing it, you have finished your lunch"
"Even thought it was a simple dish, it tasted like something you never had before."
"You called Miyuki to get the check"
"How was your meal, Master?"
"Anyway, here's your bill. You can pay it at the cashier"
"Without thinking much, you head straight to the cashier to pay your bill"
Fade_BG
Fade_BG
"Please come again, Master."
"As you walk toward the exit, Miyuki opened the door and says her farewell."
"You wave at her and gave her a smile."
"Eating out here today really refreshed your mind."
Fade_BG
"As you take a step outside, you wonders."
"When will I got a chance to meet her again"
"The end"
"This is the end of the demo"
"Thank you for playing. See you in the next update"
Change_Scene_No_Pref
